name: washingRinseCycle_setValue
description: This function is used to set the number of rinse cycles on a washing machine.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to set the rinse cycle.

parameters.name: predefinedCompartment
parameters.description: The predefined compartment to set the rinse cycle.

parameters.name: rinseCycle
parameters.description: The specific number of rinse cycles to set on the washing machine.
